body: Maybe the implementer needs to make sure messages only get processed in a serial queue?  I think I'm spamming the `processIssuedCredentialMessage` method because I'm getting flooded with EVERY message (past and present) from Pluto every time I open my app and start receiving messages

Am I correct in locating this as the actual point where the NSManagedObjectContext does the save? If so, then `performAndWait` is correct and it's not the problem I thought it was. CD should be handling it correctly. `CFNOTIFICATIONCENTER_IS_CALLING_OUT_TO_AN_OBSERVER` would suggest that this operation is either being called from the wrong thread or there's a notification happening from the wrong thread.

Hey @coveloper , Happy New Year. Strange bug, can you replicate? I tried but I could not, and I think nothing really changed in the project Core Data Stack, I think the we can book a meet for the screen sharing ;)

I'm definitely seeing this all the time, but it might be just my naive way of handling the Message queue.  I'm trying some work arounds now, but next week we could do a screen share session if I'm still having problems.
